name: Start
description: This is probably my most popular project! It's a personal new tab page with keyboard navigation, bookmarks, weather, quote, most recently listened to song, unread emails, and an image background.

name: Dashboard
description: This does a lot! Loads in the time, Philips Hue light status (only in my house), weather from OpenWeatherMap, last song from Last.fm, Google Cast details, etc.

name: Now Playing
description: This little website uses the Last.fm API to display what I'm currently listening to!

name: Weatha
description: Simple weather app built with NPM, Gulp, CoffeeScript, Pug, and Sass. The weather information comes from Dark Sky, weather icons are Skycons, also from Dark Sky.

name: Watchlist
description: My girlfriend and I made a list of movies we have and would like to watch! It's made into a website with the Harp web server, The Movie Database and some magic!

name: Drinking Games
description: A collection of drinking games, based on certain TV shows. It's also made into a website with the Harp web server.

name: Iconic
description: A one-stop shop for easy copy/pasting of all the HTML needed for using icon fonts in your webpages. Just click, and bam! Right in your clipboard.
